attributes.action: Stop the doctors moving from limeside to chadderton
attributes.additional_details: Stop the local doctors moving out of the area this would be detrimental to the community
attributes.background: Stop our local doctors moving out of the area

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about whether to relocate are a matter for individuals, including GPs, not the Government or Parliament. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.
